item.title: Goæ¯æ—¥ä¸€é¢˜_110
item.author: loommii
item.description:
å¦‚æœ Add() å‡½æ•°çš„è°ƒç”¨ä»£ç ä¸ºï¼š

func main() {
    var a Integer = 1
    var b Integer = 2
    var i interface{} = &a
    sum := i.(*Integer).Add(b)
    fmt.Println(sum)
}

åˆ™Addå‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰æ­£ç¡®çš„æ˜¯ï¼š

A.
type Integer int
func (a Integer) Add(b Integer) Integer {
        return a + b
}

B.
type Integer int
func (a Integer) Add(b *Integer) Integer {
        return a + *b
}

C.
type Integer int
func (a *Integer) Add(b Integer) Integer {
        return *a + b
}

D.
type Integer int
func (a *Integer) Add(b *Integer) Integer {
        return *a + *b
}
AC å¦‚æœæ˜¯func (a Integer) ç¼–è¯‘ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å¸®ä½ æ·»åŠ  func (a *Integer) åè¿‡æ¥åˆ™ä¸è¡Œ

ä¸‹é¢è¿™æ®µä»£ç è¾“å‡ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ

type People interface {
    Speak(string) string
}

type Student struct{}

func (stu *Student) Speak(think string) (talk string) {
    if think == "speak" {
        talk = "speak"
    } else {
        talk = "hi"
    }
    return
}

func main() {
    var peo People = Student{}
    think := "speak"
    fmt.Println(peo.Speak(think))
}

ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç è¾“å‡ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ

package main

import (
    "encoding/json"
    "fmt"
    "time"
)

func main() {
    t := struct {
        time.Time
        N int
    }{
        time.Date(2020, 12, 20, 0, 0, 0, 0, time.UTC),
        5,
    }

    m, _ := json.Marshal(t)
    fmt.Printf("%s", m)
}

Aï¼š{“Time”: “2020-12-20T00:00:00Z”, “N”: 5 }ï¼›Bï¼š“2020-12-20T00:00:00Z”ï¼›Cï¼š{“N”: 5}ï¼›Dï¼š<nil>

package main

import (
    "fmt"
)

type People interface {
    Speak(string) string
}

type Student struct{}

func (stu *Student) Speak(think string) (talk string) {
    if think == "love" {
        talk = "You are a good boy"
    } else {
        talk = "hi"
    }
    return
}

func main() {
    var peo People = Student{}
    think := "love"
    fmt.Println(peo.Speak(think))
}
